```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r example}
set.seed(1)
b <- c(-1, 4, 3)
n <- 10000
x <- runif(n, -5, 5)
f <- cbind(1, x, x ^ 2) %*% b
y <- rnorm(n, f)

mod.lm <- lm(y ~ x)
mod.tree <- tree(y ~ x)

pred.lm <- fitted(mod.lm)
pred.tree <- predict(mod.tree)

d <- data_frame(x=x, 
                observed=y, 
                lm=pred.lm, 
                tree=pred.tree) %>% 
    gather(key, value, observed:tree)

ggplot(d, aes(x, value)) + 
    geom_line(aes(colour=key,
                  linetype=key))
```
